name: product_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool target_com_shopping_api.
Tool description: Realtime APIs support entire shopping flow on Target.com.
(Free trial enabled)

API description: Returns detailed product information.
Including:
```
product variants (with different dimension like size, color and etc.
ratings and reviews
item images/videos
price
promotion
child products
```

tcin.description: Target product ID which is obtained from the product search API.

store_id.description:
The id of the store which product details data is being retrieved from. (Required, CANNOT be empty)
Value comes from nearby store API.

Example: 3330

state.description: State code of the user's location. Defaults to 'CA'.
